column1: Combo-Action: Training Agent For FPS Game with Auxiliary Tasks
Deep reinforcement learning (DRL) has achieved surpassing human performance on Atari games

column3: first-person-shooter (FPS) games in 3D environments contain higher levels of human concepts (enemy

column7: we explore a novel method which can plan on temporally-extended action sequences

Ablation study experiments also indicate that our method can boost the performance of the FPS agent in a reasonable way.
